description: This file contains automated tests for verifying the initial rendering and structure of a Kanban board component within a web application. It utilizes Playwright for browser automation to check the presence and correctness of board columns, status counters, and overall layout.

methods.name: test.describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for the initial render and structure of the board.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines individual test cases for specific UI behaviors.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Assertions used to verify the presence and state of UI elements.

methods.name: gotoHome
methods.description: Navigates the page to the home or main board view.

methods.name: getBoard
methods.description: Returns the DOM element representing the Kanban board container.

methods.name: getColumn
methods.description: Returns the DOM element for a specified column in the board.

ctags.name: summary
ctags.pattern: /^      const summary = page.getByRole('region', { name: 'Live status summary' });$/
